channel.title: Sig Tv Release
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Please leave my forum url[/size]
Well im just going to give out the photo for right now that way you can add your sigs to it the animation is really simple just open the picture in imageready drag your sigs onto the document. Then hide everything but the tv and the sig you want first then duplicate the animation screen then hide the sig you just showed and unhide the 2nd just follow those steps and when your done change the times to what ever you like
The picture is an attachment[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 05:13:06 PM[/size][hr]please post your comments dont just get it and leave -.-
